parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: (uuid) Databricks account ID of any type. For non-E2 account types, get your account ID from the

200.description: The workspace metastore assignment was successfully returned.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

get.description: Gets the metastore assignment, if any, for the workspace specified by ID. If the workspace is assigned a metastore, the mappig will be returned. If no metastore is assigned to the workspace, the assignment will not be found and a 404 returned.
